title: Kluz Prize for PeaceTech 2025
heading: Kluz Prize for PeaceTech 2025
tagline: Using emerging technologies to advance peace and human dignity
description_html:
Applications for the 2025 Kluz Prize for PeaceTech are now closed.

Winners will be announced on September 19th, 2025 during the Award Ceremony in New York.

View FAQs

About the 2025 Event

This year’s event, taking place on September 19th, 2025, marks the next chapter of the Kluz Prize for PeaceTech. The program will include:

  1. Presentations from the 2025 Prize Winners, highlighting their bold ideas and what it means to invest in PeaceTech.
  2. A high-level panel discussion exploring how to unlock the PeaceTech opportunity—moving beyond isolated prototypes to investable, scalable ventures.
  3. The official launch of a new global platform to support and connect PeaceTech innovators worldwide.
  4. A networking reception to close the event and foster meaningful collaboration.

If you're interested in attending the event, please email us at info@kluzprize.org. For any other questions, you can also visit our FAQs page or contact the organizers at the same address.

Together, we’re uncovering the boldest ideas at the intersection of technology and peace.
